lead_paragraph: Prompt admission by the Navy that an American plane carrier attacked by the Japanese a week ago off the Santa Cruz islands was so severely damaged that she had to be sunk by our own forces offers a welcome contrast to the long delays which marked acknowledgment of previous losses among our carriers.
abstract: eds on battle and US prompt rept of carrier loss
